Texts.Chs: ^orange;井^reset;可以获取水，而水是所有生物的必需物质。请从^orange;采集工作台^reset;制作一个吧。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Well^reset; is extremely important, for it provides life-giving water for numerous purposes. Build one at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 井中的水将会越来越多，当它累积到100份以上的时候，你就可以从中获取水桶。
Texts.Eng: Water in wells will gradually increase. When you have 100 or more, you can harvest buckets of water. These can be used in crafting, thrown to create lakes or placed in a Hydroponics Tray.
